医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
确定治疗退伍军人创伤后应激障碍的神经刺激目标由麻省总医院布莱根医疗系统创始成员布莱根妇女医院的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，对特定大脑网络使用神经刺激疗法可以治疗退伍军人的创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Neurostimulation-target-identified-for-treating-PTSD-in-veterans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Neurostimulation-target-identified-for-treating-PTSD-in-veterans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d874b335-8dba-4d64-8f97-0a8dec47025c Tue, 24 Sep 2024 11:03:48 -0400 Neurostimulation target identified for treating PTSD in veterans
互联网搜索预测 COVID-19 期间 ADHD 药物处方在《Brain Medicine》（Genomic Press）上发表的一项开创性研究中，UCI 研究人员发现了 ADHD 药物的互联网搜索量与 COVID-19 大流行期间的实际处方率之间存在惊人的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Internet-searches-predict-ADHD-medication-prescriptions-during-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Internet-searches-predict-ADHD-medication-prescriptions-during-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27261fa2-100a-4e5a-be71-592f40675c10 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 10:59:37 -0400 Internet searches predict ADHD medication prescriptions during COVID-19
超短心率变异性记录改变了 TBI 幸存者的恢复跟踪对于每年超过 100 万的严重脑外伤幸存者来说，康复之路往往漫长且充满挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Ultra-short-heart-rate-variability-recordings-transform-recovery-tracking-for-TBI-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Ultra-short-heart-rate-variability-recordings-transform-recovery-tracking-for-TBI-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79d050a6-d743-4f28-8a6d-a4a60e3bda48 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 10:55:00 -0400 Ultra-short heart rate variability recordings transform recovery tracking for TBI survivors
身体变形障碍患者接受裸盖菇素治疗后大脑连接发生变化身体变形障碍（BDD）是一种使人衰弱的精神疾病，其特征是过分关注自己的外表缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Brain-connectivity-changes-after-psilocybin-treatment-in-body-dysmorphic-disorder-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Brain-connectivity-changes-after-psilocybin-treatment-in-body-dysmorphic-disorder-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa6b4026-10fb-4184-baed-dd8760c031a6 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 10:48:58 -0400 Brain connectivity changes after psilocybin treatment in body dysmorphic disorder patients
研究将多发性硬化症的初始症状与长期残疾联系起来一项新的研究发现了某些初始症状与长期残疾结果之间的潜在联系，这是多发性硬化症 (MS) 研究的一项重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-links-initial-symptoms-to-long-term-disability-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Study-links-initial-symptoms-to-long-term-disability-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b1a668e-1423-41a8-9b3d-577ae6557940 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 10:44:04 -0400 Study links initial symptoms to long-term disability in multiple sclerosis
强生公司寻求首次批准尼泊卡利单抗用于治疗最广泛的抗体阳性全身性重症肌无力人群nipocalimab 的 BLA 提交标志着治疗全身性重症肌无力的重大进展，在临床试验中显示 MG-ADL 评分有所改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Johnson-Johnson-seeks-first-approval-of-nipocalimab-to-treat-broadest-population-living-with-antibody-positive-generalized-myasthenia-重症监护.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Johnson-Johnson-seeks-first-approval-of-nipocalimab-to-treat-broadest-population-living-with-antibody-positive-generalized-myasthenia- gravis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=702cc8bf-3ed8-4fe3-b28d-e4c2b4ef5add Tue, 24 Sep 2024 09:55:00 -0400 Johnson & Johnson seeks first approval of nipocalimab to treat broadest population living with antibody positive generalized myasthenia gravis
自噬激活机制的新见解由大阪大学领导的一个国际研究小组发现了一种对于启动自噬至关重要的新机制，自噬是细胞用来消除不需要或受损成分的自我降解过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-insights-into-the-mechanism-of-autophagy-activation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/New-insights-into-the-mechanism-of-autophagy-activation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cad8432-8f52-4c5a-bea9-2278e8492207 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 08:53:53 -0400 New insights into the mechanism of autophagy activation
乡村医院的家庭医生及其对剖宫产率的影响美国正在经历孕产妇健康危机，特别是在农村地区。孕产妇严重发病率和死亡率不断上升，使这一问题变得更加复杂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Family-phycians-in-rural-hospitals-and-their-impact-on-cesarean-delivery-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Family-phycians-in-rural-hospitals-and-their-impact-on-cesarean-delivery-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6a1cfbe-c6b8-4dfb-931e-106f1b7f2f41 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 08:27:56 -0400 Family physicians in rural hospitals and their impact on cesarean delivery rates
“不仅仅是一个阶段”：挑食主要受基因影响，是一种稳定的特质这项研究强调了儿童挑食的遗传基础，其中超过 70% 的影响来自基因，为饮食干预策略提供了信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Not-just-a-phase-Fussy-eating-is-mainly-influenced-by-genes-and-is-a-stable-trait.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Not-just-a-phase-Fussy-eating-is-mainly-influenced-by-genes-and-is-a-stable-trait.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e92a2f7d-4139-4c9f-ace5-87e09a5ff5e8 Tue, 24 Sep 2024 06:55:00 -0400 "Not just a phase": Fussy eating is mainly influenced by genes and is a stable trait
COVID-19 患者侵袭性肺部真菌感染的发病率和危险因素研究显示，重症患者中与 COVID-19 相关的肺曲霉病的发病率为 0.4%-2.7%，凸显了显着的死亡风险和危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Incidence-and-risk-factors-of-an-pressive-fungal-lung-infection-among-COVID-19-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240924/Incidence-and-risk-factors-of-an-pressive-fungal-lung-infection-among-COVID-19-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=850630f8-dd6d-4df2-8ca1-568564435c3b Tue, 24 Sep 2024 06:15:00 -0400 Incidence and risk factors of an invasive fungal lung infection among COVID-19 patients
